backend/main.mo: Defines rule types and presets for multiple card games including Skyjo, Mille Bornes, Nerts, Phase 10, and Flip 7 within a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking Phase 10 checkbox behaviors to specific frontend files with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including hooks, screens, components, and utilities.
frontend/deployment-logs/.gitignore: Configures Git to ignore all log files in the deployment-logs directory while retaining the directory itself.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation outlining prerequisites and steps for local deployment of the project using DFX and Node.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-and-capture-log: Node script that automates rebuild and deployment while capturing full logs into timestamped files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, root layout, authentication checks, and navigation for all app screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog for entering a user name and saves it via a mutation, then refreshes the current user profile query.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with a header, navigation, mobile menu, and routed content slot using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/rules/GameRulesD: Displays a dialog showing a game's rules and win conditions based on a provided template.
frontend/src/components/scores/EditRound: Wraps score‑entry components for different game types, manages reset state, sorting, and handles saving or canceling round edits.
frontend/src/components/scores/Flip7Scor: Captures Flip7 scoring with card selection, modifiers, multipliers, manual input, and computes per‑player scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/GenericGa: Provides a simple numeric score entry form for arbitrary games and validates all player inputs before submitting.
frontend/src/components/scores/MilleBorn: Handles detailed Mille Bornes scoring inputs such as distance, bonuses, and flags, computing each player's score accordingly.
frontend/src/components/scores/NertsScor: Form component for entering Nerts center/tableau card counts, computing scores, and submitting validated round data.
frontend/src/components/scores/Phase10Sc: Handles Phase 10 score and phase completion input per player with validation, checkbox rules, and submission state tracking.
frontend/src/components/scores/RoundsTab: Displays a table of rounds and player scores with an edit button for each round.
frontend/src/components/scores/SkyjoScor: Simple score entry form for Skyjo that validates numeric scores and submits round data.
frontend/src/gameTemplates.ts: Defines game templates and creates backend game type objects based on selected template.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoHideHeaderOnSc: Hook that hides or shows the header based on scroll direction and threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor and exposes authentication/loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSessions.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating game sessions via the actor, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfiles.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving and creating player profiles through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Implements standings calculation and game-end detection logic for multiple game types.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for session players, rounds, game entry states, and local session configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that initializes React, QueryClient, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/screens/GamePickerScreen.ts: UI screen listing selectable games and navigating to game setup.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Displays a user's saved game sessions with sorting, authentication checks, and navigation to session details.
frontend/src/screens/ProfilesScreen.tsx: UI for viewing and creating player profiles, including authentication checks and a table of existing profiles.
frontend/src/screens/ScoreSheetScreen.ts: Displays and manages scoring for a game session, handling round creation, editing, submission, and session state loading.
Screen for configuring a new game session, selecting players or quick players, setting targets, and starting the session.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, breakpoints, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and requirements for Phase 10 score submission behavior.
